On Some Local Rings (Maassaran, 2025) -- Section 02 -- Part 3

If Unknown identifier `P`P is irreducible and Unknown identifier `Q`Q has smaller degree, then a nonzero Unknown identifier `Q'`Q' has no roots among the roots of Unknown identifier `P`P in an algebraic closure.

lemma derivative_nonroot_on_roots_of_irreducible_of_natDegree_lt (P Q : Polynomial ) (hP : Irreducible P) (hdeg : Q.natDegree < P.natDegree) (hQ' : Q.derivative 0) : : AlgebraicClosure , (P.map (algebraMap (AlgebraicClosure ))).IsRoot ((Q.derivative.map (algebraMap (AlgebraicClosure ))).IsRoot ) := by classical intro hP hQ have hnot : IsCoprime P Q.derivative := by intro hcop have hiff := (Polynomial.isCoprime_iff_aeval_ne_zero_of_isAlgClosed (AlgebraicClosure ) P Q.derivative).1 hcop have htest := hiff have hP0 : (Polynomial.aeval ) P = 0 := by have : Polynomial.eval (P.map (algebraMap (AlgebraicClosure ))) = 0 := by simpa [Polynomial.IsRoot] using hP have : Polynomial.eval (algebraMap (AlgebraicClosure )) P = 0 := by simpa [Polynomial.eval_map] using this simpa [Polynomial.aeval_def] using this have hQ0 : (Polynomial.aeval ) Q.derivative = 0 := by have : Polynomial.eval (Q.derivative.map (algebraMap (AlgebraicClosure ))) = 0 := by simpa [Polynomial.IsRoot] using hQ have : Polynomial.eval (algebraMap (AlgebraicClosure )) Q.derivative = 0 := by simpa [Polynomial.eval_map] using this simpa [Polynomial.aeval_def] using this cases htest with | inl h => exact h hP0 | inr h => exact h hQ0 have hPdvd : P Q.derivative := (hP.dvd_iff_not_isCoprime).2 hnot have hle : P.natDegree Q.derivative.natDegree := Polynomial.natDegree_le_of_dvd hPdvd hQ' have hQdeg0 : Q.natDegree 0 := by intro hQ0 have hQconst : Q = Polynomial.C (Q.coeff 0) := Polynomial.eq_C_of_natDegree_eq_zero hQ0 have : Q.derivative = 0 := by rw [hQconst] simp exact hQ' this have hdeg' : Q.derivative.natDegree < P.natDegree := lt_trans (Polynomial.natDegree_derivative_lt hQdeg0) hdeg exact (not_lt_of_ge hle) hdeg'

-- Use `p.natDegree = P.natDegree`. have hdegpP : p.natDegree = P.natDegree := by -- `natDegree` is preserved by `map` (injective) and `X` has same degree as `P`. have hpdeg : p.natDegree = (X (Polynomial.natDegree_map_eq_of_injective i (RingHom.injective i) (p := P)) simpa [hpdeg, hPdeg, hdeg, hdeg] -- Finish by rewriting the sum of a sum. have hsum_add : ( x P.roots.toFinset, (Polynomial.aeval ) (P.map i) 0 := by intro h0 apply hP simpa [Polynomial.IsRoot, Polynomial.aeval_def, Polynomial.eval_at, Polynomial.eval_map] using h0 simpa [P, Polynomial.aeval_def, If a ring homomorphism stabilizes the base field via Unknown identifier `_f`_f, then the induced quotient map failed to synthesize GetElem Prop Prop ?m.13 Iff Hint: Additional diagnostic information may be available using the `set_option diagnostics true` command.Unknown identifier ``sorry[sorry] / sorry ^ sorry sorry[sorry] / sorry ^ sorry : Sort (imax u_3 u_8)[Unknown identifier `X`X]/(Unknown identifier `P`P^Unknown identifier `n`n) failed to synthesize GetElem Prop Prop ?m.29 Iff Hint: Additional diagnostic information may be available using the `set_option diagnostics true` command.Unknown identifier ``[Unknown identifier `X`X]/(Unknown identifier `P`P^Unknown identifier `n`n) also stabilizes the base field via Unknown identifier `_f`_f.

lemma stabilizesBaseFieldWith_quotientMap_pow (P P : Polynomial ) (n : ) (fX : Polynomial +* Polynomial ) (_f : +* ) (hfX : RingHom.StabilizesBaseFieldWith ( := ) (A := Polynomial ) (B := Polynomial ) fX _f) (hIJn : (Ideal.span ({P ^ n} : Set (Polynomial )) : Ideal (Polynomial )) Ideal.comap fX (Ideal.span ({P ^ n} : Set (Polynomial )))) : RingHom.StabilizesBaseFieldWith ( := ) (A := Polynomial Ideal.span ({P ^ n} : Set (Polynomial ))) (B := Polynomial Ideal.span ({P ^ n} : Set (Polynomial ))) (Ideal.quotientMap (I := Ideal.span ({P ^ n} : Set (Polynomial ))) (Ideal.span ({P ^ n} : Set (Polynomial ))) fX hIJn) _f := by intro a simpa [RingHom.StabilizesBaseFieldWith, Ideal.quotientMap_mk, Ideal.Quotient.mk_algebraMap] using congrArg (Ideal.Quotient.mk (Ideal.span ({P ^ n} : Set (Polynomial )))) (hfX a)
end SomeLocalRings
